Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Goal Create two POWL models based on a textual description of a hiring process at GlobalTeq Solutions Input A text description of the hiring process Resume Parsing Skill Assessment Cultural Fit Community Check Managerial Review Final Decision highlights a potential bias in the Cultural Fit Community Affiliation Check stage involving an XOR choice Output Format Python code using pm4py to construct two POWL models Model 1 With Potential Unfairness includes the XOR branch for community affiliation Model 2 Without Unfairness removes the XOR branch uses a standard flow Language Constraints Use the labels provided in the prompt ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck etc Technical Constraints Use StrictPartialOrder OperatorPOWL Transition SilentTransition Operator from pm4py

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Final Polish Ensure variable names are clear Make sure the explanation separates the two models clearly The prompt explicitly asks to Add edges and operators as needed Note In the loop A B A is the body B is the redo part Standard semantics Do A then exit OR do B then A Here Do DataCompletenessCheck If fail RequestMoreInfo DataCompletenessCheck again This fits Self Correction during code generation The prompt suggests using pm4py objects Ensure the imports are exactly as requested Model 1 Specifics The CommunityAffiliationCheck leads to implicit adjustments The XOR captures the choice of path Model 2 Specifics The XOR is removed CulturalFitCheck becomes a direct Transition in the sequence Lets write the code The code looks solid The variable names match the requested labels The structure reflects the prompts requirements perfectly I will present this code
